comments: I took him in the winter of 2008, he is the best POJS instructor I\'ve ever came across. He is the nicest, friendliest, and the most instructors. He makes you work hard to get an A, if he\'s not clear on something he\'s happy to go over it with you. He is the best @ doing and teaching reseacrh. If he teaches, it would be the best time to take him 1st.

Very intelligent and present written study guides in a clever matter. He wants to help students and to make them work for their grade. He?s very nice and don\'t talk while he is lecturing, sleeping/reading is OK. U will have a paper to due on study of the behavior of crime. He throws out excellent questions. He takes time to know students & concern
